text: "Free Girl Now" is a song by Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers. It's the third track and the lead single from the band's album Echo. The single peaked at position #5 on the Mainstream Rock chart.https://www.allmusic.com/artist/tom- petty-mn0000612716/awards In Canada, the song peaked at number 1 on the RPM Rock Report in April 1999. The song later repeaked at number one on the RPM rock chart in May 1999. ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:Tom Petty songs Category:Number-one singles in Canada
title: Free Girl Now
